choices: Raven
Starfire
A silent watcher (antagonist perspective)
One of the dorks (Robin, BB, or Cyborg)
A citizen they save?
1.content:
A dark cloak flutters on an unseen wind in an unlit room. The figure wearing the cloak, a young slender woman with deathly pale skin, hovers above the floor with her legs crossed, chanting an ancient incantation.

A tall scantily clad redhead rummages through a large refrigerator, humming softly to herself as she schemed the next meal for the tower. She wiggles from side to side, her lissome form moving tantalizingly as she does.

This is Titans Tower, the headquarters to some of the youngest, and most tenacious, heroes of Earth; the Teen Titans. We follow...
1.title: The Tower

choices: An incantation that increases breast size.
A spell that causes bodily growth.
A magical gemstone that enhances physical strength and muscle mass.
A cursed item that causes... less natural or savory growth down below.
Some unknown artifact with undiscovered properties.
11.content:
"Azerath, metrion, zinthos..." The chant repeated countless times, the words imbued with power untold, fueled by Raven's will and focus. Her dark leotard hugged her every curve and accentuated the pinch of her waist and the swell of her modest, yet shapely chest. The cowl of her hood hid the small red jewel in her forehead and the sharp cut of her short hair. Yet nothing could hide just how pale she was, her skin like ash and her eyes like amethyst.
She had just discovered...
11.title: Raven

choices: The spell started a slow, puberty-like growth.
She would increase in size throughout the coming day.
She would grow quickly, increasing in size over minutes.
That she would grow quickly, over seconds, and perhaps quite large...
That the spell's growth seemed tied to a specific trigger.
111.content: As her meditation progressed, she turned her attention to today's objective. She briefly bemoaned an insecurity of hers, not that she would every admit to such a thing. A nagging jealousy sat in Raven's mind, and now before her was a thick, ancient tome that promised to rectify her perceived shortcoming. She was attractive - and she knew this - but she saw the attention that Starfire always seemed to get. Raven would never wear the kinds of clothes that Starfire wore, but she knew of another way to turn heads now. She began her chant in earnest, and the book before her began to glow an Eldritch green. She would find that...
111.title: An incantation that increases breast size.

choices: Slade
Brother Blood and the Hive
Control Freak
Trigon
Wait, Terra's back?
13.content: Many are the individuals whose exceptional powers could change the world, for good or for ill. Where the Titans exact justice, they earn contempt, and their enemies are many indeed. One has managed to hatch a dastardly scheme...
13.title: A silent watcher (antagonist perspective)

choices: Slade releases a transformative, airborne agent into the tower...
Slade targets one Titan, hoping to bring them down from the inside.
Slade infiltrates the tower, posing as a Titan.
Slade releases a powerful transformative into the city's water supply!
Slade uses another as a pawn for his debased scheme...
131.content:
In a dark chamber lit only by dozens of monitors, the lone, imposing form of Slade Wilson leans forward in a high-backed chair, steepling his fingers as he peers over his surveillance.
"Of course, the Titans will rise to face me again and again. But what would happen if they could be... convinced to give into certain base instincts? What would they do if they didn't even notice the next crisis on their hands?"
131.title: Slade

info.brief_description: Our two heroines find themselves growing in various ways. NSFW
info.description:
Some rules for additions:
- The only main characters here should be Starfire and Raven from the Teen Titans franchise. Other characters can show up, but the focus should be on at least one of our two femme fatales.
- Any growth or size-related fetish is allowed. I would personally discourage BBW content, but it's technically allowed in these rules.
- Nothing gross here; no scat, gore, or death. There also shouldn't be any shaming of any sort.
- Keep the quality decent. Minimize typos, try to know what you're talking about, don't post any chapters that have any fewer than three or four sentences, et cetera.
